channel.title: Xiaomi 12 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

image.title: Xiaomi 12 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.12.0.ULITWXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12 Lite Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12 Lite Taiwan

Codename: taoyao

Version: OS1.0.12.0.ULITWXM | 14.0

Size: 6.3 GB

MD5: 77671c202dc471fc09cd19e1ffe1f385

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
